content:
I think the most unnecessary item I brought was probably the heels. I only wore them once, and it was a total overkill. I mean, Miami is all about casual, beachy vibes, and I was trying to dress up for no reason.

And my favorite part of the trip was probably the beach time. I loved relaxing on South Beach and taking long walks along the shore. The weather was perfect, and it was just what I needed to unwind.
